data.text: @JudahWorldChamp @ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm It’s like you’re almost there but still can’t let it go.

@ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm If you can make it to the end of this double talk, on both the vaccines are broken and the only option, Osterholm, after 46:00 minutes goes on a ridiculous anti-mask tirade. IMO he his no longer an effective public health advocate https://t.co/xYULcTgwfP

@ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm Zeke doing his agenda out loud this time: the governments will not allow you to protect your family’s health or industry with an “elimination strategy”, you must endure long term disease to serve the stock markets, through hazardous indoor environments

@JCochra50722415 They are literally (1) pretending Covid is just a “bad flu”, b/c admitting it’s not would make this plan unworkable and (2) concocting a fake plan they know won’t help anyone who isn’t a public official or celebrity with access to the drugs and VIP medical care.

@TheSkylineTrail @ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm I didn't bother to read his roadmap, the title told me it was taking us over the cliff, and I have no desire to follow that roadmap.
@ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm Dr. Emanuel, does the flu do this? https://t.co/qm9aEbaI4a

@ZekeEmanuel @llborio @RickABright @drdavidmichaels @mtosterholm Covid is neither a flu nor a respiratory virus. It’s a novel multi system autoimmune neurodegenerative vascular disease that shortens lifespans & disables ppl at a high rate.  We cannot live with it “just like we do w/ the flu”. And therapeutics are almost completely unavailable.
